body:
### Value My Kit

Value My Kit is a simple web app created for the [10K Apart](http://10k.aneventapart.com/) competition. It takes a very simple bit of information about your product and attempts to estimate how much your product is worth based on it's condition.

## Demo

You can view the app [working online](http://haswalt.github.com/ValueMyKit/demo/) as the application should work out of the box
name: Value My Kit
